verses.verse: I cry<WH2199> with my voice<WH6963> to Yahweh.<WH3068> With my voice,<WH6963> I ask Yahweh<WH3068> for mercy.<WH2603>
I pour out<WH8210> my complaint<WH7879> before<WH6440> him.<WH5046> I tell him<WH6440> my troubles.<WH6869>
When my spirit<WH7307> was overwhelmed<WH5848> within me,<WH3045> you knew my path.<WH5410> In the way<WH734> in which<WH2098> I walk,<WH1980> they have hidden<WH2934> a snare for me.<WH6341>
Look<WH5027> on my right,<WH3225> and see;<WH7200> for there is no one who is concerned<WH5234> for me.<WH4498> Refuge has fled<WH6> from me.<WH1875> No one cares for my soul.<WH5315>
I cried<WH2199> to you,<WH3068> Yahweh. I said,<WH559> "You are my refuge,<WH4268> my portion<WH2506> in the land<WH776> of the living.<WH2416>"
Listen<WH7181> to my cry,<WH7440> for I am<WH1809> in desperate<WH3966> need.<WH1809> deliver<WH5337> me from my persecutors,<WH7291> For they are stronger than me.<WH553>
Bring<WH3318> my soul<WH5315> out of prison,<WH4525> that I may give thanks<WH3034> to your name.<WH8034> The righteous<WH6662> will surround<WH3803> me,<WH1580> for you will be good to me.
